meanings.sent1: The water treatment plant is ozonating the drinking water to make it safe to drink.
meanings.sent2: The scientist is ozonating the air in the lab to remove any impurities.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried ozonating the vegetables, but they ended up tasting like the ocean!
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was ozonating her mind with fresh ideas after a long walk in the park.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays were ozonating the earth, creating a protective layer in the atmosphere.

meanings.definition: To undergo a process of ozonation.
meanings.sent1: The fruits are ozonating in the machine to extend their shelf life.
meanings.sent2: The water is ozonating as part of the purification process in the treatment plant.
meanings.sent3: The teddy bear looked surprised as it was ozonating in the toy cleaner.
meanings.sent4: The city seemed to be ozonating with energy as the festival approached.
meanings.sent5: The room was ozonating with a fresh, clean scent after the cleaning crew finished their work.
